690540.name: Fantasy Grounds - The Sixth Gun Companion (Savage Worlds)
690540.description:
The Sixth Gun Companion

The Sixth Gun Companion contains the following pieces:
  • 'Neath the Gallows Tree, a Tall Tale of The Sixth Gun written by Scott Woodard, which contains 6 pages of additional comic material from Cullen Bunn and Brian Hurtt!
  • Creature Feature: Griselda the Grey Witch
  • Creature Feature: The Great Wyrms
  • Fractured Frontiers: a Savage Tale of Deadlands and The Sixth Gun
  • Pre-Generated Characters, a set of Six characters ready to play in the world of The Sixth Gun RPG
Fantasy Grounds Conversion: Matt Rimler
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Matt Rimler
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds Adventure Edition ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
